item.title: MEMO: Amazon S3 - Amazon Simple Storage Service
item.description: MEMO: Amazon S3 - Amazon Simple Storage Service What is S3. Save place to store your files. Is a object-base storage. The object is spread across multiple devices and facilities. The basic of S3. Buckets A bucket is a container of objects stored in Amazon S3. Every object is contained in a Bucket. Bucket name is a univeral namespace. That is, name must be unique globally. Each bucket created in a specific region.

item.title: Refactoring Strategy Pattern Swift -2020
item.description: Problem An Example of strategy applies to the eCommerce, domain is computed discounts to other base on the behavior of the customer, attributes of ordered items. A clear Example of Strategy applied in getting discount on food delivery order. Example: Oder food delivery with some discount rule: Discount 10% for User have 100 or more grab reward point. Discount 5$ apply to order with price total 100$ or more. Discount 7% apply to order have at least 10 distinct items UML class diagram implements strategy pattern
